questions.text: Who is the only person that can travel between both universes?
questions.explanation:
Access.

	Axel Asher is Access, a human with the ability to travel between the DC and Marvel universes. He can also combine characters from both universes at will.

questions.text: Who is Logan Wayne's alter ego?
questions.explanation:
Dark Claw.

	Dark Claw is a combination of Batman and Wolverine, who battles the Hyena, an amalgamation of The Joker and Sabretooth. Logan Wayne is a do-nothing playboy by day, using that persona to mask his nighttime crusading.

questions.text: What was Amazon's lasso made out of?
questions.explanation:
Lightning.

	Amazon was a combination of Wonder Woman and Storm. She had a lasso made of lightning that forced anybody in its grasp to speak the truth. Amazon could mentally prevent this lasso from electrocuting its targets.

Cairo.

	Raised in Cairo, Elektra Kyle was an ambassador's daughter who learned ninjitsu after her father was killed. She became the mercenary Catsai, and was hired to kill Dare The Terminator. The two instead became friends. As can be inferred from her name, Catsai combines Elektra and Catwoman.

questions.text: After being kicked out of the circus, where did Nightcreeper live?
questions.explanation:
New Jersey.

	Nightcrawler and The Creeper were combined to form Nightcreeper, who has the power of teleportation, as well as increased agility. He has been a member of both the Judgement League Avengers and the JLX.

False.

	Bruce Wayne worked for S.H.I.E.L.D., not S.W.O.R.D. A supporting character in this series was Moonwing, a mixture of Moon Knight and Nightwing.

Magneto.

	Magneto formed the Magnetic Men to battle his brother, an evil version of Will Magnus.

questions.text: Who has not been Speed Demon?
questions.explanation:
Barry Allen.

	Jay Garrick was the first Speed Demon, who lost his soul at the hands of his archenemy, the Night Spectre. The second Speed Demon was Blaze Allen, an amateur magician, whose wife's soul was also taken by the Night Spectre. Together with Wally West, they freed both souls and defeated the Night Spectre.

questions.text: Spider-Boy was romantically linked with the Insect Queen.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Spider-Boy was Pete Ross, and a combination of Spider-Man and Superboy. He was engaged to the Insect Queen, Mary Jane Watson.

questions.text: Niles Cable led which superheroic team?
questions.explanation:
X-Patrol.

	The X-Patrol combined elements of the Doom Patrol and the X-Men. Niles Cable was a cyborg time-traveler who later became a paraplegic.
